This build in installed on trelenggtk in B6.  You can reproduce this problem by 
running 

./eclipse ../../jdk1.4.2_03/jre/bin/java

in dir

/buildtest/N-N20040304-200403040010/eclipse-testing/eclipse

The problem is coming from a typo in the manifest.
There were a missing whitespace after the export-package header.

Once that has been fixed, there is still one thing that I can not explain:
- why once the manifest has been fixed I could not restart.

It is even more strange because I tried again later and it worked.
Closing since we second issue mentionned can not be reproduced.
